H0.text: who was the mexican commander who surrendered to the texans at the capturing of san antonio. Martín Perfecto de Cós

H1.text: who was the mexican commander who surrendered to the texans at the capturing of san antonio. José Urrea

H2.text: who was the mexican commander who surrendered to the texans at the capturing of san antonio. Adrián Woll

H3.text: who was the mexican commander who surrendered to the texans at the capturing of san antonio. Sanchez Navarro

A4.text: Cos surrendered San Antonio de Béxar and its weapons to the Texians on December 9

A5.text: Cos and his men were released on their pledge not to oppose further the Constitution of 1824
